content: field-tested literally over many happy miles while walking the dog happy enough with version 3 to upload pattern **design criteria** 1 warm light comfortable not bulky - no seams 2 mitts do not ride up or fall off 3 able to whistle for dog with mitts on 4 long enough in the hand to allow me to carry a bucket of water to the geese and have the handle sit on the mitt and not on my skin 5 elegant - have had requests ooh can you knit me a pair 6 easy quick and enjoyable to knit
